PathOfBuilding.Notes:
The damage for Cast when stunned is very conditional, so please take POB number with a grain of salt, and refer to real in-game footage to estimate true dmg :D We play POE, not POB!!!
Progenesis is a luxury buy I just obtained. I've afked ~20 Simulacrums through wave 15 without it, and I think just for Simulacrum, using a Bottled Faith for more dmg is better. Progenesis is really good to try facetanking harder more juiced contents later though.
